title: Human donor
description: Schema for submitting a human donor.
comment: This object is meant to be one to one with an individual human.

ethnicity.title: Ethnicity
ethnicity.comment: We use http://bioportal.bioontology.org/ontologies/SNOMED-Ethnic-Group as a template for the enum list of ethnicities.

parents.title: Parents
parents.comment: This is a link for cases when families are all donors in our system. Children will be calculated from this link.

items.title: Parent
items.comment: For human biosamples, see human_donor.json for available identifiers.

siblings.title: Siblings
siblings.description: Donors that have at least one parent in common with this donor.
siblings.comment: This is a link for cases when families are all donors in our system.

items.title: Sibling
items.description: A donor that has at least one parent in common.
items.comment: For human biosamples, see human_donor.json for available identifiers.

twin.title: Twin
twin.description: A human donor that is a twin sibling of this human donor.
twin.comment: For human biosamples, see human_donor.json for available identifiers.

twin_type.title: Twin type
twin_type.comment: The type of the twin sibling of this donor (dizygotic or monozygotic)

items.title: Database external identifier
items.description: Identifier an from external resource that may have 1-to-1 or 1-to-many relationships with ENCODE objects.
